mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, FJZCH, YF, HQGS, GZGS, HHGS, LXGSDJ, FLXGSDJ, CYHCFYBL
mapper.insert:
insert into D_028
ID,
DPRTCODE,
WHBMID,
WHRID,
WHSJ,
FJZCH,
YF,
HQGS,
GZGS,
HHGS,
LXGSDJ,
FLXGSDJ,
CYHCFYBL,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{yf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hqgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{gzgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hhgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cyhcfybl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update D_028
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YF = #{yf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HQGS = #{hqgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GZGS = #{gzgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HHGS = #{hhgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LXGSDJ = #{lxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLXGSDJ = #{flxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CYHCFYBL = #{cyhcfybl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_028 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YF = #{yf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HQGS = #{hqgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GZGS = #{gzgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HHGS = #{hhgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LXGSDJ = #{lxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLXGSDJ = #{flxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CYHCFYBL = #{cyhcfybl,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_028
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HQGS = #{hqgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GZGS = #{gzgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HHGS = #{hhgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LXGSDJ = #{lxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLXGSDJ = #{flxgsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CYHCFYBL = #{cyhcfybl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where fjzch = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yf = #{yf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, DPRTCODE, FJZCH, YF, HQGS, GZGS, HHGS, LXGSDJ, FLXGSDJ, CYHCFYBL , DPRTNAME from ( select d1.ID, d1.DPRTCODE, d1.FJZCH, d1.YF, d1.HQGS, d1.GZGS, d1.HHGS, d1.LXGSDJ, d1.FLXGSDJ, d1.CYHCFYBL, dprt.dprtname from D_028 d1 left join t_department dprt on d1.dprtcode = dprt.id where d1.fjzch = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_date(d1.yf, 'yyyy-mm') <= to_date(#{yf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm') order by d1.yf desc ) where rownum = 1
